website_summaries.verdict: If your top priority is thick padding, this mid-range-price model is a good choice.
pros: Extra-thick padding adds to its comfortable seating angles
Chair adjusts easily to suit individual comfort levels
cons: fortunately, it's not too difficult to put together
Wheel movement is rough, making it hard to maneuver

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best "kneeling chair" on the market in terms of quality manufacture, sturdy construction, ease of assembly, attractive appearance, flexible adjustment to user's body proportions, and comfort, with the proviso that all "kneeling chairs" result in some stress on knees or shins because, however carefully one adjusts the chair and however prudently one centers one's weight on the seat rather than the knee rest, some weight does shift to the knee rest. If this is a problem for you, which you aren't willing to relieve by occasionally standing or removing the legs from the knee rest, then no "kneeling chair," not even this very solid one, is for you.
customer_reviews.author: ECat

customer_reviews.title: This is the one I chose.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered four different kneeling chairs at the same time to try out. Each were well liked for different reasons. This is the one I chose. Reasons: Both cushions are thick. The seat cushion slants so it doesn't hurt under thigh. The frame is very sturdy and strong. It not only adjusts in height, but it can be adjusted from seat to kneeling with a three hole choice. (the only one that had that) This is what really sold me. I was able to find that perfect position of sitting/kneeling which allows my back to naturally straighten. Thanks to Amazon's return policy I was able to investigate first hand.
customer_reviews.author: GaryLH

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable option, adjustable, but foam is hot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take pressure off my belly during my third trimester - definitely does the trick and I am grateful to have an affordable alternative to sitting uncomfortably in my normal office chair all day. It has some limited options to adjust the space between the kneeling pad and the seat (I am at the shortest setting and am 5'0" - it is working for me fine) and to move the seat up and down. I am only giving 4 stars rather than 5 stars because the foam is HOT. My knees are very comfortably sinking into the very deep foam (really nice that it is soft and so thick), but my knees are also really over-heated.
customer_reviews.author: butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Not for someone with poor knees
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this chair would alleviate my discomfort from sitting in a desk chair for 8 plus hours a day. Although my back did hurt less, my knees and rear end could only handle this chair for a couple of hours and then both were achy - my knees were the worst. Not sure if it's because I'm long legged and the chair wasn't big enough or what. The assembly directions were poor - fairly condensed picture with the parts next to where they would go. I don't recall seeing anything that told you the rod that goes between the 2 frame pieces expands. Sending it back but I get to pay return shipping
customer_reviews.author: Breb

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, room for some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid piece of furniture. Just what I expected. My two comments about potential improvements would be that (a) the assembly diagram looks like it was done by a family member learning a drafting program, and (b) the casters are cheap and do not turn well. I replaced them with a set of solid, rollerblade silicon casters that won't dig up the floor and which turn readily.
customer_reviews.author: tobi keefe

customer_reviews.title: Cushions are great!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews for these types of chairs and one of the main drawbacks of many is that the cushions are too thin. These cushions are great and I cannot feel the chair through them. Another feature I love about this chair is the adjustable height/angle of the top cushion. It's on a rotating rod instead of predetermined slots, so you can get the height/angle just right.
customer_reviews.author: dr.cakes

customer_reviews.title: This chair has comfortable padding and works well for short periods of time
customer_reviews.text: This chair has comfortable padding and works well for short periods of time. I have some difficulty adjusting it so that there is more space between the kneeling cushion and the seat cushion. I feel like my legs get squished in there a little bit and this makes kneeling on it for long periods of time a little problematic. Overall, it is fine - maybe I just need to learn how to use it better.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Great product at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I expected. The design is very simple so easy to put together, but the instructions could have been more clear. It was hard to know which bolts were which. Again, it was simple, so easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: the criticism about the wheels is valid. It doesn't roll well when seated in it. However, it has relieved some of my back issues associated with sitting. I'm glad I bought it and will use it often.
customer_reviews.author: eolian2000

customer_reviews.title: nice padding
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very comfortable and was relatively easy to put together even though the instructions were a bit vague. I've had several kneeing chairs in the past and the thick padding makes all the difference, I also like the fabric surface that prevents sliding around. I left the wheels off and applied felt stickies so it would be nice to my hardwood floors. Perfect height without the wheels because i have a low desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair...crappy instructions
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself is super sturdy and comfortable...well worth the money. Be advised that the instructions are horrible....I'm a graphic designer and to think someone would spend the money on a fancy 4 color brochure only to reproduce the instructions and schematics as an unintelligible photocopy is frankly dumb. But other than that...a good product.3rd generation
customer_reviews.author: Joe Back Pain

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for a chair like this for years
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a chair like this for years! Easy to build (though the directions were all pictures and required my glasses), sturdy, and very, VERY comfortable! Best of all, is the padding and the fact that it's adjustable in 2 ways. It's a shame the company doesn't make that more clear. I would have bought it instantly. Now that I know, I'm even more happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Cuddihee

customer_reviews.title: Deep padding and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The chair was a little tricky to put together without another set of hands, but doable. I like that it has one solid knee pad area rather than one for each leg. Makes it easier to get on to and allows for more personal positioning. The seating pad is very thick and comfortable. I'm only 5'4" but it fits me just fine. Any discomfort is merely from weak stomach muscles after prolonged sitting. Only issue I've found with the chair is the wheels tend to lock themselves after moving around awhile.
customer_reviews.author: sondraz

customer_reviews.title: An excellent cost effective kneeling chair.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid well made product with excellent customer service. The padding is as advertised and assembly is easy. It promotes good posture. However, I returned the chair because my arthritic knees ( need replacements) wouldn't allow me to comfortably sit for more than 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: dougster

customer_reviews.title: The construction is excellent. Very sturdy and should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: The construction is excellent. Very sturdy and should last a long time. I'm 6'4 and weigh 230 and am not worried at all that this will hold up. The padding is GREAT compared to others I've seen. It isn't the easiest to put together. It has instructions but could include better guidelines on which of 3 holes to use for adjusting as they aren't easy to change once together. The screw for adjustment took me using a large sdet of channel locks so there is NO way someone could hand tighten or loosen to adjust the seat height.
customer_reviews.author: JC Prime User

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: It's is a sturdy chair. If you don't know if you want a kneeling chair than I won't try to convince you to get this, but it is a solid implementation of the idea.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: It's no magic bullet for a bad back, but it does help
customer_reviews.text: I got this to change up the way I sit, since I spend all day at a computer. It's no magic bullet for a bad back, but it does help. This one has good padding and overall works well. Collapses in case you need to travel with it. Reasonably priced. I have two. First one I've had for a year and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: jly34

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chair. So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Chair. So comfortable. I purchased another chair and it was a pile of junk. This is worth the little extra cost. Easy to put together. Lots of padding. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: notcz

customer_reviews.title: This is a strong and sturdy chair. I've purchased two others with only the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong and sturdy chair. I've purchased two others with only the first purchase (a wooden kneeling chair) being worthy of reviewing until now. This one is not only very supportive of a large person (or small), the adjusted sitting position is PERFECT. Other chairs don't adjust low enough and sit you well above your computer monitor. I ended up returning the chair I just spoke of. This one has incredible cushions and just the right adjustment capability for I would think most people (even those over 6 feet). My husband who uses this chair is only 5'7" so it works great for him. Highly recommend! We may buy another one to replace our wooden one!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Mathison

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This chair went together very easily...I put the parts on the drawings of them on the directions as another reviewer had recommended. I've been using it for about a week now, and it is well cushioned, nice quality and very stable. In order to get the steeper seat angle that I wanted and still be at the right height for my keyboard, I took off the casters, which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marcye

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for those with back or hip issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair after my hips started bothering me. Hip problems are now gone. Impossible to have poor posture while using this chair. It took a few days to get used to it and I always take a break a few times a day to keep up my circulation. I highly recommend this chair to anyone who spends a few hours sitting at a desk every day.
customer_reviews.author: Berserker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered a total of three of these chairs. The first was ordered because my son injured one of his core muscles and couldn't sit in a regular chair. This chair helped so much that he now has one for his home and his office and we have one here for when he visits It was packaged well and very easy to assemble. I would highly recommend this chair
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, didn't suit me
customer_reviews.text: This chair was comfortable enough, but I just too short at 5'1". I had to raise it up to the highest settings to get it high enough for my desk, but then the angle was too steep. Would be fine for someone of average height.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D.

customer_reviews.title: Relief for those that need it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a couple for employees with back/leg issues. They love it. Pretty solid unit.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy D

customer_reviews.title: He is especially pleased with the padding as his last chair was very ...
customer_reviews.text: This was given to my Grandson (Age 20 yrs.) as a gift and the feedback is that he loves it. He is especially pleased with the padding as his last chair was very deficient in this area and he is on the computer a lot with on-line classes.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda Riggan

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, but casters are a problem
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself works well for support. However, the casters do not spin freely (have tried a couple different kinds of casters), completely digging up our wood floor. I suspect the holes in the frame are not aligned perfectly vertical, so that the casters do not readily move well, especially if moving (for example) forwards or backwards and then to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Rehbach

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Chair is not easy to adjust. There are only 3 positions and it is not easy to adjust from on position to another. Must be turned upside down and rod with washers must be removed and repositioned. Padding appears thick, but is flimsy and not supportive. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good chair - Bad assemby instructions!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair. It is a good quality. My only complaint is the horrible assembly instructions. At lease place some NORMAL instructions online or a video, that is not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Frank James

customer_reviews.title: Great find.  Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Despite comments about the instructions, I had NO difficulty assembling the chair. It is perfect for my and my family's needs. It is quite attractive.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable padding!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is much more comfortable than the kneeling chair I had had completely worn out after about 20 years! I think I still need to make some adjustments to get the chair to fit me exactly, but it is working pretty well for me so far. Delivery was prompt and the chair arrived with no damage and all parts. Assembly was a little tricky (no written instructions, just illustrations), but my husband and I were able to put it together in about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The casters got bent and the chair is now hard ...
customer_reviews.text: The casters got bent and the chair is now hard to roll around. There is no contact information how to get replacement casters
customer_reviews.author: Don Power

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR PAIN RELIEF
customer_reviews.text: WORKS REALLY WELL ON RELIEVING THE LOWER BACK PAIN. WOULD HAVE BEEN A 5 IF THE CHAIR SWIVELED.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to put together, comes with assemble tool. More padded than similar chairs.
customer_reviews.author: winchester

customer_reviews.title: You have to try this if you have lower back problems!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I sit in it all day long every day at work at my computer. Because you are leaning forward, there is no pressure on your lower back. I purchase the office supplies for the company I work for and this is the one I recommend. I keep one as a sample for people to try before I purchase for them. Some people like the ball chair, but they can only use it for a couple of hours a day. There is no back support. This is by far the most popular. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: as comfortable as it can be
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's advertised to do, as comfortable as it can be... but will take time to adjust to it.
customer_reviews.author: Connor J. Davies

customer_reviews.title: comfortable enough but the wheels aren't great at rotating and ...
customer_reviews.text: comfortable enough but the wheels aren't great at rotating and the padding gives more than I'd like (not a heavy guy by any means). Still, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: The chair makes my back feel great. However
customer_reviews.text: The chair makes my back feel great. However, after some length of time, my knees feel tired. I will try standing at regular intervals.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry C

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: For my wife. Helped her back pain significantly. Only issue is padding is a little hard. Otherwise it is good
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Paturel

customer_reviews.title: sit straight !
customer_reviews.text: love it. super high quality, thick cushion, have perfect posture effortlessly. recommended to anyone who wants one of these chairs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this! Big Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I did receive instructions with my chair and in fact the company emailed the instructions at the time of my purchase. I saw that in a review someone had suggested that so they took that suggestion, which is awesome. I paid full price for the chair and I think it's a great price, a great value, especially that it includes 2 day shipping for Prime. Gotta love that. Again, I will say I am VERY impressed with this company. Looking through the reviews and seeing how they responded back to folks that weren't 100% happy, and how they resolved the situations, made me 100% comfortable and buying this chair and I am 100% pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair, Poor Padding
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and makes my back feel wonderful, however "50% extra padding" isn't enough or the right kind of foam for the knee pad. My knees/shins are sore from a couple of hours use yesterday. I was hoping this would be my full-time at-work chair, but I'm afraid I'll need to modify the pads in order to make it through a full day.
customer_reviews.author: JClouseau

customer_reviews.title: Hip pain
customer_reviews.text: I had hip surgery and sitting in a regular chair at work was killing me! This chair has helped tremendously, i can sit all day long now with no hip pain. I've also noticed that i can sit in a regular chair longer before my hip starts to hurt. Only problem I've had is that 2 of the wheels seem to lock up and not roll as freely as the others. If you have back or hip pain this chair can help!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele A. Hiam

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could be adjusted
customer_reviews.text: The chair is built well. I only have two issues with it. The seat is too slanted, even after adjusting the height. Because of this I'm continually adjusting to push myself back up on the seat. The other issue is how much cushioning is on the knee pad. This causes my knees to slip to one side or the other. So I usually only sit with one knee on and the other extended. Other than that it's a good chair and has relieved some back issues due to sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great padding and sturdy construction - only wish there were a way to easily adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just wonderful..
customer_reviews.text: No wheels were included .......just wonderful.....what a pain Update.....they offered me a whole new chair for free without even returning the other one.....even though I did return it......Great way to rectify the siuuation...so I changed it to 4 stars for the company....will adjust it when I actually try the chair
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cristaldi

customer_reviews.title: ... roll very well so gouged my hardwood floor up pretty bad. It also isn't easily adjustable and thus ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair had a wheel that didn't roll very well so gouged my hardwood floor up pretty bad. It also isn't easily adjustable and thus not very comfortable. Pass this by or be sorry you didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lee

customer_reviews.title: Can't even assemble it.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and is flat packed. To assemble it, the very first instruction is to pass a long piece of metal through the 2 main leg frames. But the holes in the leg frames were not drilled correctly, so the product could not be assembled at all. Sending it back and buying a different product. Useless. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Janie JF

product_meta.title: KHALZ Kneeling Chair with Extra Thick Cushions, Non-Stick Mesh Fabric, Height Adjustable Ergonomic Stool, Improves Posture, Mobile
product_meta.description:
We have designed the khalz kneeling chair with thick padding to maximize comfort for your knees and bottom. The khalz kneeling chair has been made with YOU in mind and if you are not satisfied with any part of our product - contact us and we will do whatever we can to make it right. 

We know that people spend a long time sitting at their desks, so it may as well be as comfortable and ergonomically friendly as possible by using a strong, comfortable and durable kneeling chair. 
Kneeling chairs by design promote better posture by preventing many of the bad habits traditional desk chairs encourage such as slouching or hunching. This chair is recommended for people up to 6' 2" in height and 240 lbs in weight. 

ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS: Please see the images above for included assembly instructions. 

IMPORTANT: If purchasing for health/pain relief, please first check with your health care provider to ensure this kneeling chair is right for your specific condition.
feature_bullets: EXTRA PADDING: Khalz kneeling chairs have more padding than most other kneeling chairs on the market to allow you to sit more comfortably for longer.

COMFORTABLE: Extra padding makes it much easier on your knees, making it great for prolonged use. If you are under 6' 2" in height this chair should be perfect for you by helping your body sit correctly by reducing slouching and hunching when sitting at your desk.
ADJUSTABLE: Adjust the chair up or down to suit your height. Max height: 30" (75cm), Min Height 20.5" (52cm)
STRONG: Steel frame built to last much longer than wooden kneeling chairs. Maximum Weight: 240lbs

ERGONOMIC: Designed to promote correct posture when sitting at your desk. the khalz kneeling chair has the optimal angle seat to significantly aid in posture improvement. IMPORTANT NOTE: If purchasing for health/pain relief, please first check with your health care provider to ensure this kneeling chair is right for your specific condition.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars78 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
